original_text: Everywhere in Persia and Media, the wives of the king's officers will know what Queen Vashti has done. From today, they will refuse to obey their husbands. They will no longer respect their husbands, and the men will be very angry.
korean_text: 오늘이라도 바사와 메대의 귀부인들이 왕후의 행위를 듣고 왕의 모든 지방관들에게 그렇게 말하리니 멸시와 분노가 많이 일어나리이다

sentences.original_text: the wives of the king's officers
will know what Queen Vashti has done.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕후 바스디가 무엇을 했는지 알게 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: they will refuse to obey their husbands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 남편에게 순종하기를 거절할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will no longer respect their husbands,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 자기 남편을 존경하지 않을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and the men will be very angry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남자들은 매우 화가 날 것입니다.
